sections.text:
2-1244.Horseracing industry participant, defined.

For purposes of sections 2-1243 to 2-1246, horseracing industry participant shall mean an individual who currently holds a valid license for purposes of conducting horseracing from the State Racing and Gaming Commission and who owns, trains, cares for, or rides horses stabled at a licensed racetrack enclosure in this state for the purpose of horseracing at the live race meeting at such racetrack.

SourceLaws 1993, LB 471, ยง 6;Laws 2021, LB561, ยง 24;Laws 2025, LB357, ยง 11.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
